alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 12:28PM EDT until July 12 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Falls Village. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The water reaches Riverside Road at Kent School and floods the picnic area along Route 7 near Housatonic Meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon and continue falling to 5.4 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.6 feet on 04/14/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Tue 11 am: 7.9 Forecast: Tue 2 pm 7.7 Tue 8 pm 7.5 Wed 2 am 7.4 Wed 8 am 7.2 Wed 2 pm 6.9 Wed 8 pm 6.7 Thu 2 am 6.5 Thu 8 am 6.3 Thu 2 pm 6.0 Thu 8 pm 5.8 Fri 2 am 5.6 Fri 8 am 5.4 &&
